benefits.title: Exceptional Strength Gains
benefits.description: Dramatic increases in strength and power output due to enhanced androgen receptor binding.

benefits.title: Fat Loss & Nutrient Partitioning
benefits.description: Superior nutrient partitioning effects leading to simultaneous muscle gain and fat loss.

benefits.title: No Estrogen Conversion
benefits.description: Cannot convert to estrogen, resulting in dry, hard muscle gains without water retention.

benefits.title: Enhanced Recovery
benefits.description: Significantly reduced cortisol levels leading to faster recovery and reduced catabolism.

sideEffects.warning: Trenbolone is one of the most potent anabolic steroids with significant side effects. Regular blood work and careful monitoring are essential.

categories.description: Anxiety, insomnia, increased aggression, and night sweats are common ('tren sides').
Significant impact on lipid profile, blood pressure, and potential cardiovascular strain.
Can cause respiratory issues including increased breathing rate ('tren cough').
Very strong androgenic effects: acne, hair loss, prostate issues.
Extreme suppression of natural testosterone production, requiring extensive PCT.

protocol: Wait 2 weeks after last trenbolone injection (if using acetate)
HCG: 2000IU EOD for 2 weeks before starting SERMs
Extended PCT may be necessary due to strong suppression

studies.title: Nutrient Partitioning Effects
studies.description: Research demonstrates trenbolone's unique ability to promote protein synthesis while simultaneously reducing fat mass through enhanced nutrient partitioning.

studies.title: Muscle Growth Mechanisms
studies.description: Studies show trenbolone's superior anabolic effects through multiple pathways, including enhanced IGF-1 production and satellite cell activation.
